title: Permanently banned?
body:
I just wanted to know why this account was perma banned. It was probably due to being toxic, but I am disappointed I wasted my time in hospital trying to recover the account, only to find out after being discharged that it was permanently banned :')

I'm not mad, this is only a smurf, but i'd still like to know what I would have been capable to receive the ban.

Thanks :)
Skylava // I forgot my name

replies.body: So it actually doesn't look like this account was banned for anything like toxicity, but rather the system noticed that someone might have been trying to hack into your account. Hit up our account team asap in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can verify you as the account creator and get this cleared up!

Thanks heaps for the reply Broporo!
I have sent in a ticket just now - I was trying to recover an old account of mine, and I was hoping this is why the account would get temporarily locked/banned. :)

Regards,
Skylava // I forgot my name
